import React from'react';import jsPDF from'jspdf';import'jspdf-autotable';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PdfGenerator=_ref=>{let{dataset}=_ref;const generatePDF=()=>{const pdf=new jsPDF();pdf.text('Relatório de Dados',10,10);const columns=["Ano","Ganho","Perda"];const rows=dataset.map(data=>[data.year,data.userGain,data.userLost]);pdf.autoTable({head:[columns],body:rows,startY:20});// Salvar ou exibir o PDF
pdf.save('relatorio.pdf');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:generatePDF,children:"Gerar PDF"})});};export default PdfGenerator;
